item.title: Trump pauses all U.S. military aid to Ukraine after angry clash with Zelenskyy
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump has paused military aid to Ukraine following his clash with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy last week.

item.title: EU chief proposes plan to 'urgently' increase defense spending by mobilizing around $840 billion
item.description: "Europe is ready to massively boost its defense spending," European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said Tuesday.

item.title: Mexico extradites 29 drug cartel members to U.S. for trial as Trump tariffs loom
item.description: Canada and Mexico are trying to get the United States not to follow through on a promise by President Trump to impose tariffs of 25% on imported goods...

item.title: Trump dashes hopes for last-minute Canada and Mexico deal ahead of 25% tariffs
item.description: The president discussed tariffs during a White House event touting a $100 billion investment in the U.S. by Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing.

item.title: Watch live: Trump expected to announce $100 billion investment in U.S. by TSMC
